00003 /**
00004  * @brief Quantum random bit generator class.
00005  * 
00006  * This class provides a PHP wraper for the QRand Command-line Utility [v0.2, 2007-07-17].
00007  * 
00008  * The following constant must be defined:
00009  * \li \c BOO_QRBG_CMD = The qrand command '/PATH_TO/./qrand'.
00010  * \li \c BOO_QRBG_CACHE = Use cache (bool).
00011  * \li \c BOO_QRBG_CACHE_SIZE = Size of cache, try setting to 1000.
00012  * \li \c BOO_QRBG_USERNAME = Your QRBG Service username.
00013  * \li \c BOO_QRBG_PASSWORD = Your QRBG Service password.
00014  * 
00015  * @class       Boo_Qrbg
00016  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00017  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00018  * @copyright   2008 David Singer
00019  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00020  * @version     2.0.5
00021  * @required    http://random.irb.hr/ QRand Command-line Utility [v0.2, 2007-07-17]
00022  */
00023 
00024 class Boo_Qrbg extends Boo_Db {

00056     /**
00057      * @brief Default constructor.
00058      * @return void.
00059      * @param string $username[optional] Your QRBG Service username.
00060      * @param string $password[optional] Your QRBG Service password.
00061      */
00062     public function __construct($username = false, $password = false) {
00063         parent::__construct(self::TABLE_NAME, self::PRIMARY_KEY);
00064         
00065         if ($username !== false) {
00066             $this->setUsername($username);
00067         }
00068         
00069         if ($password !== false ) {
00070             $this->setPassword($password);
00071         }
00072     }
00073     
00074     /**
00075      * @brief Sets the username.
00076      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00077      * @param string $username The username.
00078      */
00079     public function setUsername($username) {
00080         $username = trim($username);
00081         
00082         if (Boo_Validator::isUsername($username)) {
00083             $this->username = $username;
00084             return true;
00085         } else {
00086             trigger_error("Username {$username} is not valid", E_USER_ERROR);
00087             return false;
00088         }
00089     }
00090     
00091     /**
00092      * @brief Gets the username.
00093      * @return string The username.
00094      */
00095     public function getUsername() { return $this->username; }

00098      * @brief Sets the password.

00100      * @param string $password The password.
00101      */

00103         $password = trim($password);
00104         
00105         if (Boo_Validator::isPassword($password)) {
00106             $this->password = $password;
00107             return true;
00108         } else {
00109             trigger_error('Password (hidden) is not valid', E_USER_ERROR);
00110             return false;
00111         }
00112     }

00123      * @param int $port The port number.

00125     public function setPort($port) {
00126         $port = (int) $port;
00127         
00128         if (Boo_Validator::isInt($port, 0, 65535)) {
00129             $this->port = $port;
00130             return true;
00131         } else {
00132             trigger_error("Port {$port} is not valid", E_USER_ERROR);
00133             return false;
00134         }
00135     }

00167      * @brief Gets a 16-bit integer.
00168      * @return int 16-bit integer on success, FALSE otherwise.
00169      */
00170     public function getInt8() {
00171         $exec = $this->exec('int8');
00172         return isset($exec[0]) ? (int) $exec[0] : false;
00173     }

00301     /**
00302      * @brief Executes QRand or grabs value form cache.
00303      * @return mixed Returns value on success, FALSE otherwise.
00304      * @param string $type[optional] Data type.
00305      * @param int $count[optional] Number of values to return.
00306      */
00307     protected function exec($type = 'int', $count = 1) {
00308         $type = strtolower(trim($type));
00309         $count = (int) $count;
00310         $output = array();
00311         
00312         if (BOO_QRBG_CACHE && $count == 1) { // cache is only supported for single requests
00313             // try cache
00314             
00315             $dbh = Boo_Db::connect();
00316             $stmt = $dbh->prepare("SELECT * FROM {$this->tableName} WHERE type = :type LIMIT 1");
00317             
00318             $stmt->bindParam(':type', $type);
00319             $stmt->bindColumn($this->primaryKey, $cacheId);
00320             $stmt->bindColumn('value', $value);
00321             
00322             try {
00323                 $stmt->execute();
00324                 $result = $stmt->fetch(PDO::FETCH_BOUND);
00325                 if (!$result) {
00326                     // no rows found, fill cache
00327                     
00328                     $cache = array(); // array for cache
00329                     $cmd = BOO_QRBG_CMD . " --user=\"{$this->username}\" --pass=\"{$this->password}\" --count=\"" 
00330                         . BOO_QRBG_CACHE_SIZE . "\" --type=\"{$type}\" --text";
00331                     exec($cmd, $cache);
00332                     
00333                     if (empty($cache)) {
00334                         trigger_error('Cache is empty, check BOO_QRBG_CMD', E_USER_ERROR);
00335                         return false;
00336                     }
00337                     
00338                     // remove one item from cache for ouput
00339                     $output[0] = array_pop($cache);
00340                     
00341                     // save the rest to the database
00342                     $this->saveCache($cache, $type);
00343                     
00344                 } else {
00345                     // row found, set output
00346                     $this->removeCacheById($cacheId);
00347                     $output[0] = $value;
00348                 
00349                 }
00350             } catch (Exception $e) {
00351                 trigger_error($e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
00352                 return false;
00353             }
00354             
00355         } else {
00356             // do not use cache
00357             exec(BOO_QRBG_CMD . " --user=\"{$this->username}\" --pass=\"{$this->password}\""
00358                 ." --count=\"{$count}\" --type=\"{$type}\" --text", $output);
00359                 
00360             if (empty($output)) {
00361                 trigger_error('Error output is empty', E_USER_ERROR);
00362                 return false;
00363             }
00364         }
00365         return $output;
00366     }
00367     
00368     /**
00369      * @brief Removies item form cache.
00370      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00371      * @param int $cacheId The cache ID.
00372      */
00373     protected function removeCacheById($cacheId) {
00374         $dbh = Boo_Db::connect();
00375         $stmt = $dbh->prepare("DELETE FROM {$this->tableName} WHERE {$this->primaryKey} = :cache_id LIMIT 1");
00376         $stmt->bindParam(':cache_id', $cacheId);
00377         
00378         try {
00379             $stmt->execute();
00380         } catch (Exception $e) {
00381             trigger_error($e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
00382             return false;
00383         }
00384         return true;
00385     }
00386     
00387     /**
00388      * @brief Saves an item to cache.
00389      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00390      * @param mixed $cache Item to save to cache.
00391      * @param string $type The type.
00392      */
00393     protected function saveCache($cache, $type) {
00394         $type = strtolower(trim($type));
00395         $dbh = Boo_Db::connect();
00396         
00397         foreach($cache as $key => $value) {
00398             $stmt = $dbh->prepare("INSERT INTO {$this->tableName} (
00399                 value, 
00400                 type
00401                 ) VALUES (
00402                 :value, 
00403                 :type
00404                 )");
00405             
00406             $stmt->bindParam(':value', $value);
00407             $stmt->bindParam(':type', $type);
00408             
00409             try {
00410                 $stmt->execute();
00411             } catch (Exception $e) {
00412                 trigger_error($e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
00413                 return false;
00414             }
00415         }
00416         return true;
00417     }
00418     
00419     /**
00420      * @brief Removes all items from cache.
00421      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otheriwse.
00422      */
00423     public function clearCache() {
00424         $dbh = Boo_Db::connect();
00425         $stmt = $dbh->prepare("DELETE FROM {$this->tableName}");
00426         
00427         try {
00428             $stmt->execute();
00429         } catch (Exception $e) {
00430             trigger_error($e->getMessage(), E_USER_ERROR);
00431             return false;
00432         }
00433         return true;
00434     }
00435     
00436     /**
00437      * @brief Tests the \c BOO_QRBG_CMD.
00438      * 
00439      * @warning Uses \c var_dump().
00440      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00441      */
00442     public function testCmd() {
00443         
00444         $output = array();
00445         $returnVar = false;
00446         $cmd = BOO_QRBG_CMD . " --user=\"{$this->username}\" --pass=\"{$this->password}\" --count=\"1\" --type=\"int\" --text";
00447         
00448         exec($cmd, $output, $returnVar);
00449         var_dump($output);
00450         var_dump($returnVar);
00451         
00452         if ($returnVar == 126) {
00453             trigger_error('Command ' . BOO_QRBG_CMD . ' is not executable, try chmod +x qrand', E_USER_ERROR);
00454             return false;
00455         }
00456         return true;
00457     }
